providers.name: Trenitalia
providers.description: Trenitalia is the primary train operator in Italy, providing domestic and international train services.
rules: Seat reservation required on high-speed trains
Changes allowed with fee for flexible tickets
providers.advantages: Reliable and fast travel across Italy with broad coverage
refunds: Full refund available up to 24 hours before departure
Partial refund (50%) up to 12 hours before departure
Administrative fee may apply for refunds
